price: Barang siapa yang mengerjakan amal yang saleh, maka (pahalanya) untuk dirinya sendiri dan barang siapa yang berbuat jahat, maka (dosanya) untuk dirinya sendiri dan sekali-kali tidaklah Tuhan-mu menganiaya hamba-hamba(Nya).
arabic: مَّنۡ عَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلِنَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَسَآءَ فَعَلَيۡهَاۗ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: man ʿamila ṣāliḥan falinafsihi waman asāa faʿalayhā wamā rabbuka biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
translations: then it is for his soul
